subject: UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION
body:
UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION UNIT, IN AFFILIATION WITH WORLD BANK AUDITORS.U.S.A GOVERNMENT/UNITED NATIONS SCAM VICTIMS
COMPENSATIONS PAYMENTS.MIDDLES EAST OFFICE.
 6/ 2/2024
Attention; Sir
Good day sir. We have a good news for you now. So kindly respond to this mail so that i can elucidate your clear understanding.
My Regards and awaiting your immediate reply.
Mr.Mohammed Ali Abdul
Director Middle East UNO Zonal Office
+971527328353

subject: Re:    UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION
body:
Hello Ali Abdul,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm intrigued by your message and would love to hear more about this good news you mentioned. Could you please provide more details?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION
body:
UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION UNIT, IN AFFILIATION WITH WORLD BANK
AUDITORS.U.S.A GOVERNMENT/UNITED NATIONS SCAM VICTIMS COMPENSATIONS
PAYMENTS.MIDDLES EAST OFFICE



9/2/ 2024



Attention; Sir
This is to bring to your notice that I am delegated from the United Nations
organization, Reserve bank of America to pay 150 scam victims $1,850,000.00
Dollars ( ONE MILLION EIGHT HUNDRED AND FIFTY THOUSAND  UNITED STATE
DOLLAR) each. You are listed and approved for this payment as one of the
scammed victims to be paid this amount, get back to me as soon as Possible
for the immediate payments of your $1,850,000.00 Dollars compensation funds.

On this faithful recommendations,

we want you to know that during the last U.N. meetings held at white house
in alliance with Middle East Leaders,  it was alarmed so much by the world
in the meetings on  the lost of funds by various individuals to the scams
artists operating in syndicates all over the world today.

 So in other to compensate victims, the U.N Body in  Conjunction with the
American Government is now paying 150 victims of this operators
$1,850,000.00 Dollars each in accordance with the U.N. recommendations .

And due to the corrupt and inefficient Banking Systems in the world, the
payments are to be supervised by the United Nations' Officials and JANATA
BANK LIMITED UAE as the authorised paying bank.

According to the number of applicants at hand, 114 Beneficiaries has been
paid, half of the victims are from the United States, and we still have
more 36 left to be paid the compensations of $1,850,000.00 Dollars each.

Your particulars was mentioned by one of the Syndicates who was arrested as
one of their victims of the operations, you are hereby warned not to
communicate or duplicate this message to him for any reason whatsoever as
the U.S. secret service in conjunction  with Middle East Intelligent Bureau
are already on trace of the other criminals. Other victims who have not
been contacted can submit their application as well for scrutiny and
possible consideration.
Finally, respond to this message so that we can guide you to the only
authorized paying bank here in the United Arab Emirates for your immediate
compensation release to your favor.
My Regards

Mr.Mohammed Ali Abdul
Director Middle East UNO Zonal
+91527328353

subject: Re: UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION
body:
Hello Ali Abdul,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite an unexpected piece of news. I'm a bit surprised and overwhelmed, to be honest.

I understand that you're saying I've been listed as a victim of some sort of scam and am now eligible for compensation. However, could you please provide more details about how my name was mentioned and by whom? Also, what kind of scams are we talking about here?

You also mentioned something about the United Nations and JANATA BANK LIMITED UAE being involved in these payments. Could you explain their roles a bit more? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
George

subject: pg47836@***.com
body:
UNITED NATIONS COMPENSATION UNIT, IN AFFILIATION WITH WORLD BANK
AUDITORS.U.S.A GOVERNMENT/UNITED NATIONS SCAM VICTIMS COMPENSATIONS
PAYMENTS.MIDDLES EAST OFFICE

9/2/2024
Attention; Sir.
Thanks for your response.And we noted it's contents therein. You are in the
right place,i assure and reassure you.
We discovered your name for this very payment  during our database search.
And is is not a joking thing.
However,my official id card copy is attached. And it is not what matters.
What is important is your compensation is the genuity of it.
We are on maintaince and after that we will write with our official emails
hopefully by monday.
Finally,if you are ready to receive your payment,speedily reconfirm your
personal details,such as Full name,id card copy,
,correct contact address. As soon as you do so we shal process and obtain
the final approval on your name. thereafter ,your funds are effected to
your favor without stress or hitch.

My Regards
Mr.Mohammed Ali Abdul
Director Middle East UNO Zonal
+971527328353

My official id card copy attached.

subject: Re: pg47836@***.com
body:
Hello Ali Abdul,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite interesting to hear about this payment, although I must admit it's a bit unexpected. 

Could you please provide more information on how my name was discovered during your database search? Also, could you elaborate on the process of obtaining the final approval?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
George
